content: Considerate un router Wi-Fi e i dispositivi in rete in casa. Ogni dispositivo riceve segnali dal router, che trasmette dati da Internet.
translations: eng:Consider a Wi-Fi router and networked devices around the home. Each device receives signals from the router, which trans
